guys,listen to me :
if you are alone on my torrent,it might be more difficult to get the file for you,so in this case,you must absolutely give your maximum upload for best chance to get this one.
And especialy if you have a slow connection or low upload or more so.
Don't forget to make a speed test by your torrent client settings option,thereby it will be the best way to rightly set this one in mirror of your personal connection.
for exemple :
you have a connection with 10 meg down and 1 meg up
right settings in Bandwidth section will be like :
max upload rate (kb/s) : 90
alternate upload rate when not downloading kB/s : 0 (checked,enable)
Global Download rate (kB/s : 0
Number of Connections :
Global Maximum number of connections : 450
Maximum number of connected peers per torrent : 100
Number of upload slots per torrent : 6
use additional upload slots if upload speed
